name: How to Make Coconut Milk
description: Learn how to make coconut milk at home! You only need a few simple ingredients to make this luscious, creamy and thick plant milk.

recipeInstructions.text: To a high powered blender, add the shredded coconut flakes, room temperature water and optional maple syrup and vanilla. Blend on high for 1-2 minutes until creamy and white.
recipeInstructions.name: To a high powered blender, add the shredded coconut flakes, room temperature water and optional maple syrup and vanilla. Blend on high for 1-2 minutes until creamy and white.

recipeInstructions.text: Strain the coconut milk through a nut milk bag, cheesecloth or thin tea towel over a large bowl.
recipeInstructions.name: Strain the coconut milk through a nut milk bag, cheesecloth or thin tea towel over a large bowl.

recipeInstructions.text: Pour into containers and store in the refrigerator for 4-5 days. Separation is natural, so shake before using. It can also be frozen, if needed.
recipeInstructions.name: Pour into containers and store in the refrigerator for 4-5 days. Separation is natural, so shake before using. It can also be frozen, if needed.

recipeInstructions.text: Use anywhere you would dairy milk, such as cereal or oatmeal. It's also a good substitute for store bought canned coconut milk, like in Tikka Masala or Thai Green Curry.
